price: Or do they possess the treasuries of the mercy of your Lord, the All-Mighty, the Bestower?
arabic: أَمۡ عِندَهُمۡ خَزَآئِنُ رَحۡمَةِ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡوَهَّابِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
